title: Drawing, "Design for Streamline Sleeper Car with Two Seat Compartment", January 16, 1935
medium: Airbrush and watercolor, gouache, brush and metallic paint, graphite on paperboard
markings: Loewy office label affixed to verso
signed: Signed in pen and white gouache, lower right:  Loewy "35"
inscribed: On label, verso: Raymond Fernand Loewy/580 Fifth Avenue, New York City/Two Seat Compartment (fixed), RL./Drawing no. 26/date 1/16/35
provenance: Pennsylvania Railroad; Robert Watson, Philadelphia, PA; Sale Barry  Slosberg Auctions, Philadelphia, PA,  9/2005, lot 2055; David Repp, Pacifica, CA; Hampton Wayt, Aiken, SC in 2008
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
